name: GymNOW
description: An app I helped develop during the summer of 2017. It lets users search for gyms that offer single day passes, and a variety of other offers.

name: Calcuweightor
description: A simple Ionic/Angular app for calculating weight when you have mixed standard weights in the gym.

name: Stop The Outbreak
description: A game for and exhibit in the Moorehead Planetarium, it is a simulation style game intended to educate public about the difficulty of squelching Malaria outbreaks.
